column4: i want to rotate my screen display but failed (in 7.10 gutsy). i used system -> preference -> screen resolution in doing so but my mouse clicks have failed after a rotation... until time out after which returns to the original display mode. any idea?
what do you want to do??
I want to rotate the screen clockwisely in "screen resolution"...
thats xrandr ... i dont have idea about it ..google it and ask RyanPrior

are you on a live cd?
then afaik fdisk -l wont show any output :) you will have to boot into the HDD's Ubuntu
